title: Identify Bonds in Reactants
text: Count the number of each type of bond in the reactants (C₃H₈ and O₂).

title: Identify Bonds in Products
text: Count the number of each type of bond in the products (CO₂ and H₂O).

title: Calculate Total Energy for Reactants
text: Use the bond energies to calculate the total energy required to break all bonds in the reactants.

title: Calculate Total Energy for Products
text: Use the bond energies to calculate the total energy released when forming all bonds in the products.

title: Calculate Enthalpy Change
text: Subtract the total energy of the products from the total energy of the reactants to find the enthalpy change (ΔH).
